akas: Ein Hoch auf Huckle! Germany (DVD title)
akas from release info: Ein Hoch auf Huckle! Germany (DVD title)

-1.title: The Red Spot Painter Mystery
-1.plot: Someone is painting red spots on all sorts of things in Busytown! Huckle and the gang set out to find the culprit!A teeny weeny piano motivates Huckle, Sally and Lowly to try to figure out who would own such a small instrument.

1.title: The Big Apple Mystery/The Missing Pickle Car Mystery
1.plot: A giant wooden apple on the fruit store sign falls off and no one knows where it went./When Mr Frumble�۪s newly painted green Pickle Car mysteriously disappears, Huckle determines he will find it and solve the Mystery of the Pickle Car Puzzle.

2.title: The Mystery wheel/Busytown Blue-Bottoms
2.plot: When Huckle, Lowly and Sally discover a missing wheel by the roadside, Huckle determines he will solve the Mystery of the Missing Wheel by figuring out what the wheel is missing from./Several Busytown characters are dismayed to discover blue paint stains on the back of their clothing. Huckle sets out to find the bench in need of a 'wet paint' sign.

3.title: The Mystery of the Lost Parrot/The Monster Mystery
3.plot: A series of strange sightings has Lowly convinced there's a monster loose in Busytown Lake!Huckle and his pals try to track down a bad driver.

4.title: The Trouble with Bubbles/Little Orphan Egg
4.plot: Two identical tanker trucks pull into Gramps Gas Station at the same time. Shortly after, Huckle and his pals notice cars spewing bubbles and conking out. Huckle and his team solve the mystery by finding out bubble bath soap was pumped into the gas station tank by mistake./Huckle, Lowly and Sally find an abandoned egg in the park. They search for a nest that has similar-looking eggs.

5.title: The Lighthouse Ghost Mystery/Cornfield Confusion
5.plot: Regardless of Hilda Hippo�۪s photo of a ghost in the mansion by the lighthouse, Huckle sets out to prove there are no such thing as ghosts by solving the Mystery of the Lighthouse Ghost./A sign directing customers to a sweet corn stand comes loose and swings upside down so the arrow points the opposite way.

6.title: The Sticky Stuff Mystery/Up, Up and Away
6.plot: Busytown pedestrians are getting their feet stuck in purple goo. In solving the mystery, Huckle notices these sticky puddles always appear under toothpaste billboards./The kids help decorate used cars for Jack's big sale. Suddenly, all the helium balloon go missing...and so does Pig Won't

7.title: Six Little Muffins/The Crashing Cans Mystery
7.plot: Hilda invites her friends over for muffins, but someone keeps taking them, one by one. Huckle finds clues that reveal the culprit is getting in and out of the house without touching a door or the floor./When Huckle and Sally�۪s dad finds a stack of cans in his store toppled again and again each morning, Huckle determines to solve the Crashing Cans Mystery by figuring out who is toppling them and how.

8.title: The Invisible Cake Snatcher/On the Move
8.plot: When the cake Huckle, Lowly and Sally plan on using in their Science Fair exhibit mysteriously disappears from a locked room, it begins to look like the culprit was invisible and could walk through walls./Sally's scooter vanishes. Knowing that the kickstand sometimes fails, Huckle concludes that it must have rolled down the sloped street.

9.title: Litterbug Busters/There Might Be Giants
9.plot: It appears a litterbug is dumping garbage on Mulberry Road. Huckle decides to solve the mystery of who it is by looking for clues about the culprit in the discarded trash./Giant ���footprints�۪, squashed car tops and broken tree tops have the Pig Brothers convinced giant robots from outer space are the cause.

10.title: Where's Junior?/The Secret Club Mystery
10.plot: When no one can find where Junior monkey went, Huckle, Lowly and Sally are saddled with his baby sister while they try to solve the Missing Monkey Mystery./Pig Will and Pig Won't invite their friends to become members of their secret club.

11.title: The Playground Mystery/The Crazy Clock Mix-Up Mystery
11.plot: When first home plate, then a bunch of other playground items start mysteriously disappearing, the kids are convinced it�۪s the work of some mysterious Playground Grabber./En route to Mr. Fix-It�۪s shop to have his broken portable video game repaired, Huckle, along with Lowly and Sally, is surprised when the clocks around them suddenly go crazy causing all kinds of confusion.

12.title: The Cheese Car Chomp Mystery/Where's the Hero?
12.plot: When the mouse family discover someone, or something, has taken a big bite out of their cheese car, Huckle promises to figure out who is putting the bite on the mouse family./The kids witness someone rescuing Granny Goat from the train tracks. After the train passes, the hero is gone. Granny Goat didn't even get a chance to thank him.

13.title: The Mystery of the Unbreakable Bed/The Twisty Line Mystery
13.plot: For some strange unknown reason, every loaf of bread in Busytown is hard as cement!/On the outskirts of Busytown, the center line on the road suddenly goes twisty. It confuses drivers, causing them to veer off the road.

14.title: Chain of Mysteries/The Mystery of the Unfinished Painting
14.plot: Someone put locks and chains on the teeter-totter, the lift bridge and sausage-truck. Huckle and his pals figure out the one thing they have in common is a very noisy squeak./On a windy day, the kids find an unfinished portrait. Using clues about the sea admiral in the picture, they try and track him down to ask where they can find the artist.

15.title: The Pretty Park Mystery/The Missing Museum Statue Mystery
15.plot: Topiary shrubs resembling Busytown citizens, mysteriously appear in the park. Huckle and the gang find some clues that lead them to the barbershop./Vincent Van Goat is Busytown�۪s most famous artist known for making statues out of various food items. When his latest food sculpture mysteriously disappears, Huckle, Lowly and Sally set out to solve the Missing Museum Statue Mystery!

16.title: The Vanishing Tiara Mystery/The Postage Stamp Mystery
16.plot: When Belinda Bear, a circus trapeze artist, loses her good luck tiara, it�۪s up to Huckle, Lowly and Sally to find it./Mr. Frumble has lost a prized butterfly stamp from his collection. Thinking that he may have accidentally mailed it away on a birthday card, Huckle and his team chase the envelope all the way to the post office...but the stamp isn't there

17.title: The Bank Note Mystery/The Flying Saucer Mystery
17.plot: When Huckle and his pals find a mysterious note at the Busytown Bank, Pig Will and Pig Won�۪t think its from bank robbers. Instead of warning their friend Bruno, the bank security guard, as the Pigs suggest, Huckle leads the others off to solve the Bank Note Mystery!/Goldbug always shows up to give a live news report about Huckle's mysteries. So how come he's not there when the kids are buzzed by a tiny flying saucer?

18.title: The Smudged Letter Mystery/The Mystery Present
18.plot: Huckle and his friends find a present with wrapping paper showing a baby theme. Needing more clues, but reluctant to open someone else's gift, Huckle gets it X-rayed to see what's inside./Caught in a water fight, Huckle and his pals accidentally smudge the address on a letter Postman Pig has to deliver, leaving him with no idea of who it�۪s supposed to go to

19.title: The Falling Fruit Mystery/The Dragon Hunters
19.plot: One of the cherry trees in Patrick Pig's orchard has mysteriously dropped all its fruit. After doing some detective work, Huckle and his pals find out that Hilda gave the tree a good shake while retrieving her tangled kite./When Pig Will and Pig Won't claim there's a fire-breathing dragon marauding the streets of Busytown, Huckle and his friends want photographic evidence.

20.title: The Disappearing Swimming Hole/The Forgotten Fire Hose Mystery
20.plot: When all the water in the gang�۪s swimming hole suddenly disappears overnight, Huckle declares he�۪s going to solve the Mystery of the Missing Swimming Hole by figuring out what happened to the water./Hearing a report of a giant snake lurking in Busytown Park, Huckle, Lowly and Sally rush to alert the Busytown Fire Department who spring into action only to find they can�۪t go anywhere until they find a missing hose.

21.title: The Disappearing Home Mystery/The Flipping, Flying, Slipping, Sliding Mystery
21.plot: When the Raccoon family return home to find their entire house empty, Huckle, Lowly and Sally set out to solve the Disappearing Home Mystery!/Huckle, and his pals strive to get to the bottom of why things made of metal are flipping and flying around Busytown.

22.title: The Mystery of the Unpopular Pizzeria/The Silly Scarecrow Mystery
22.plot: Everyone's favourite pizzeria is closing due to a sudden lack of business. Huckle and his pals discover that everyone likes pizza, but their phone calls for home delivery are being misdirected to the home of the grumpiest guy in Busytown./When Pig Will and Pig Won�۪t find corn straw on their bedroom floor, they become convinced it�۪s Farmer Pig�۪s scarecrow who�۪s out to get them for calling it silly looking.

23.title: Huckle, Where's My Apple Car?/The Dirty Laundry Mystery
23.plot: Parking his famous apple car beside Granny Good-Pig�۪s Applesauce stand, Lowly joins Huckle and Sally in the orchard, picking apples for Granny to practice her fast as lighting peeling skills./When Mrs Murphy discovers mysterious drips on the newly washed clothes hanging on her line, Huckle, Lowly and Sally come to the rescue, determined to help Sergeant Murphy shed his stain covered uniforms by solving the Dirty Laundry Mystery.

24.title: The Eight Shoes Mystery/The Something in the Woods Mystery
24.plot: When Shoemaker Sam come across a bag containing eight shoes to be repaired and an urgent unsigned note to return them in time for ���the concert tonight�۪, Huckle, Lowly and Sally set out to find the owners and solve the case of the Eight Shoe Mystery!/When Huckle, Lowly and Sally go camping, they encounter a strange stumbling, moaning ���something�۪ in the woods. Things get even more spooky when they go to report it to Ranger Wendy only to discover she�۪s mysteriously disappeared right ...

25.title: The Borrowed Book Mystery/The Mystery of the Missing Mystery Books
25.plot: When Sally needs a specific book for a school report on trees, she finds it�۪s overdue at the Busytown Library and the Librarian can�۪t read who took the book out because of a mysterious green drip covering the name./The Busytown Bookshop is missing a new delivery of 'Molly Mystery' books. Huckle and his friends search unsuccessfully for the box marked with double 'M's.

26.title: The Mystery of the High Jumper/The Mystery of the Summer Snowman
26.plot: Someone who can jump as high as a house is putting advertising stickers on everything, much to the annoyance of Busytown residents./When a snowman appears in Busytown on a hot summer day, Huckle and his pals want to find out why he's not melting.

39.title: The Lost Key Mystery/The Door Knocker Mystery
39.plot: Forgetful Mayor Fox has misplaced the giant key to the city that he's supposed to be presenting to a visiting astronaut. Huckle and his pals try to figure out where he set it down. They learn that Mayor Fox did one thing while touring a candy factory that required both his hands - stirring a huge pot of candy goo. Not far away they find a big chocolate-covered key. / A couple of Busytown residents are confounded by mysterious knocking at their doors. Huckle and his mystery-solving team attempt to find out who it is, but they're eluded at every turn. When they're drawn...

6.title: The Now You See It Now You Don't Mystery/The Mystery of the Missing Pirate Gold
6.plot: Huckle, Lowly and Sally set out to discover why all their mini putt balls are disappearing. / When the gold coins Mr Fix It finds on the beach disappear, Huckle, Lowly and Sally set out to find out where they went.

7.title: The Disappearing Dolly Mystery/The Vanishing Vehicle Mystery
7.plot: Huckle and his pals help Baby Sadie find her lost dolly which had mysteriously gone missing. / Cars are disappearing from a particular parking space, Huckle and gang set out to find out why.

13.title: Mystery of the Lost Camera
13.plot: Photos left on a lost camera help Huckle and pals find its rightful owner.A list Sally made mysteriously disappears right off the page.

imdb.title: Busytown Mysteries

production companies.name: Canadian Film or Video Production Tax Credit (CPTC)

plot: Childrens' show based on the classic works of author and illustrator Richard Scarry centers on six characters solving the mysteries of everyday life in an imaginary place called Busytown.::IMDb editor
